author: Vexed (@vexingvexed)
description: Get users to add their anniversary, then on their anniversary they will get a special role. Server owners can set the time of day, announcement message and role.
end_user_data_statement: This cog will associate a User ID with a anniversary if the user explicitly sets it. This data is also associated with a specific guild ID. No other data or metadata about users is stored.
install_msg:
Thanks for installing! You can set the cog up with `[p]anset interactive`, then your members can use `[p]aniv set <date>`.

This cog has docs! Check them out at <https://go.vexcodes.com/c/anniversary>
name: Anniversary
short: Anniversary cog with customisable roles, messages and times.
